# 1. iteration
# j loop
0
01101111000000000000000000000000
0
00000000000000000000000000000000

# addi x1, x1, 1
0
10010011100000000001000000000000
0
00000000000000000000000000000000

# addi x2, x2, 1
0
00010011000000010001000100000000
0
00000000000000000000000000000000

# addi x3, x3, 1
0
10010011100000010001000100000000
0
00000000000000000000000000000000
